short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Uses a search engine to find results filtered to the Reddit website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a button to the toolbar for text input that will open a new tab to the results page of a search engine filtered to show results only from the Reddit website.
Due to community dissatisfaction with the native Reddit search implementation, it is commonly recommended to utilize filtered third-party searches such as Google, this extension is designed to save users the time of typing the "site:" filter manually.
